titles.ar: كتاب الزِّيِّ وَ التَّجَمُّلِ وَ الْمُرُوءَةِ
titles.en: The Book of Outfits and the Beautification and the Magnanimity
Chapter 39 – Cutting the grey hair and plucking it
Chapter 39 – Cutting the grey hair and plucking it

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ سِنَانٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا بَأْسَ بِجَزِّ الشَّمَطِ وَ نَتْفِهِ وَ جَزُّهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَيَّ مِنْ نَتْفِهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Ali Al Washa, from Abdullah Bin Sinan, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is no problem with cutting the grey hair and plucking it, and cutting it is more beloved to me than plucking it’.

verses.text: عَنْهُ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَمَّنْ ذَكَرَهُ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( صلوات الله عليه ) قَالَ لَا بَأْسَ بِجَزِّ الشَّمَطِ وَ نَتْفِهِ مِنَ اللِّحْيَةِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
From him, from Ibn Fazzal, from the one who mentioned it, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is no problem with cutting the grey hair and plucking it from the beard’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ النَّوْفَلِيِّ عَنِ السَّكُونِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ أَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ ( عليه السلام ) كَانَ لَا يَرَى بِجَزِّ الشَّيْبِ بَأْساً وَ يَكْرَهُ نَتْفَهُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Al Nowfaly, from Al Sakuny, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> that Amir Al-Momineen<sup>asws</sup> did not view the cutting of the grey hairs as a problem, and disliked plucking it’.

verses.text: وَ بِهَذَا الْإِسْنَادِ قَالَ ( عليه السلام ) أَوَّلُ مَنْ شَابَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ ( عليه السلام ) فَقَالَ يَا رَبِّ مَا هَذَا فَقَالَ نُورٌ وَ تَوْقِيرٌ قَالَ رَبِّ زِدْنِي مِنْهُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
And by this chain, 
‘He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The first one to be grey-haired was Ibrahim<sup>as</sup>. He<sup>as</sup> said: ‘O Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! What is this?’ So He<sup>azwj</sup> Said: “A radiance and a reverence”. He<sup>as</sup> said: ‘Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! Increase for me<sup>as</sup>, from it’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَفْصِ بْنِ الْبَخْتَرِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ كَانَ النَّاسُ لَا يَشِيبُونَ فَأَبْصَرَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ ( عليه السلام ) شَيْباً فِي لِحْيَتِهِ فَقَالَ يَا رَبِّ مَا هَذَا فَقَالَ هَذَا وَقَارٌ فَقَالَ يَا رَبِّ زِدْنِي وَقَاراً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hafs Bin Al Bakhtary, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The people were not becoming grey-haired. So Ibrahim<sup>as</sup> saw something in his<sup>as</sup> beard, so he<sup>as</sup> said: ‘O Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! What is this?’ So He<sup>azwj</sup> Said: “This is a reverence”. So he<sup>as</sup> said: ‘O Lord<sup>azwj</sup>! Increase the reverence for me<sup>as</sup>’’.

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ أَبِي أَيُّوبَ الْمَدِينِيِّ عَنْ سُلَيْمَانَ الْجَعْفَرِيِّ عَنِ الرِّضَا عَنْ آبَائِهِ ( عليهم السلام ) قَالَ الشَّيْبُ فِي مُقَدَّمِ الرَّأْسِ يُمْنٌ وَ فِي الْعَارِضَيْنِ سَخَاءٌ وَ فِي الذَّوَائِبِ شَجَاعَةٌ وَ فِي الْقَفَا شُؤْمٌ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from Abu Ayoub Al Madainy, from Suleyman Al Ja’fary, 
(It has been narrated) from Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup>, from his<sup>asws</sup> forefathers<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The grey hair in the front part of the head is a Blessing, and in the two sides is generosity, and in the top is courage, and in the back is inauspiciousness’.
